query:
select
                    distinct Users.*
                from
                    UserGroupMap
                join
                    Users on Users.id = UserGroupMap.uid
                join
                    Transactions
                where
                    (UserGroupMap.gid = Transactions.sender or UserGroupMap.gid = Transactions.receiver)
                    and Transactions.id = ?
                    and Users.id != ?
                    and Users.id != ?
